attributes.review: When I got this a app I thought bunker boy but he's a lying, racist, homophobic, xenophobic etc. president with a neck vagina.

attributes.review: so i wanted to support my president so i downloaded the app. turns out it was just a scam to steal card information so now i’m broke and my parent have disowned me.

attributes.review: This app doesn’t even deserve a star⭐️. I downloaded this app to support mr. President and I remember that trumps🤢🤮😴🤡 not my president, Obama is😁🥰😘
It is by far the most useless, unnecessary app and has gave me lots of bad luck. Trump 2020🇱🇷✨🧚🏽‍♀️🥰but on a gravestone ✨🧚🏽‍♀️🥰💅🏽
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever had. This man is a racist white suprematist who does not deserve to have an app.
As a loyal Trump supporter this app was terrible to use. Not user friendly at all and gave me a virus on my phone. DO NOT USE!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE, HORRIBLE, WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: the app is terrible and it really confused me and asked me for my location and when i gave it fbi agents showed up at my house and kidnapped my grandma
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: horrible app, nobody who truly supports OUR president should get this 😤😡😡😡

attributes.review: I wanted to vote for the man but then my cat started flying and my pig ate my donkey sooo now i live in shrek’s shack
